TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpCookiesSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookiesSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定 Web 應用程式使用之 Cookie 的屬性。

span.span: Configures properties for cookies used by a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別 (Class) 提供以程式的方法，存取和修改組態檔的 `httpCookies` 區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpCookies` section of a configuration file. 它會定義除非發行 cookie 的程式碼會覆寫它們，根據預設套用至應用程式時，所發出的所有 cookie 的設定。It defines the settings applied by default to all cookies issued by the application, unless the code issuing the cookie overrides them. 一個目標`httpCookies`項目是以支援使用`HttpOnly`cookie。One objective of the `httpCookies` element is to support the use of `HttpOnly` cookies. `HttpOnly` cookie (cookie`HttpOnly`屬性) 來協助降低風險的跨網站指令碼的 Internet Explorer 6 中所導入。`HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting. `HttpOnly`屬性可防止 cookie 正由用戶端指令碼存取。The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script. 包含的任何資訊`HttpOnly`cookie 不太可能會透露給駭客或惡意的網站。Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site. 如需詳細資訊，搜尋 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) 中的"HttpOnly。 」For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly." > [!NOTE] > 可以讀取和寫入資訊的相關區段的組態檔區段屬性根據其實。The can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property whose value is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 網域名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie domain name.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpOnlyCookies { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用對瀏覽器的 Cookie 支援。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the support for the browser's cookie is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用 Cookie 的支援，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if support for the cookie is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `httpCookies`項目支援使用`HttpOnly`cookie。The `httpCookies` element supports the use of `HttpOnly` cookies. `HttpOnly` cookie (cookie`HttpOnly`屬性) 來協助降低風險的跨網站指令碼的 Internet Explorer 6 中所導入。`HttpOnly` cookies (cookies with the `HttpOnly` attribute) were introduced in Internet Explorer 6 to help mitigate the risk of cross-site scripting. `HttpOnly`屬性可防止 cookie 正由用戶端指令碼存取。The `HttpOnly` attribute prevents cookies from being accessed through client-side script. 包含的任何資訊`HttpOnly`cookie 不太可能會透露給駭客或惡意的網站。Any information contained in an `HttpOnly` cookie is less likely to be disclosed to a hacker or a malicious Web site. 如需詳細資訊，搜尋 MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) 中的"HttpOnly。 」For more information, search MSDN (msdn.microsoft.com) for "HttpOnly." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property bool RequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 通訊是否必要。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) communication is required.

value.span: 如果啟用 SSL，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性啟用或停用安全 cookie 屬性 RFC 2109 中所述的輸出。The property enables or disables output of the secure cookie attribute as described in RFC 2109. 由相容的瀏覽器時，才會傳回透過使用 SSL/TLS 連線傳送 cookie。When used by compliant browsers, the cookie will only be sent back over a connection using SSL/TLS. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/CS/httpCookiesSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HttpCookiesSection/VB/httpCookiesSection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::SameSiteMode SameSite { System::Web::SameSiteMode get(); void set(System::Web::SameSiteMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 的 SameSite 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the SameSite attribute of the cookie.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，代表 Cookie 的強制模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the enforcement mode of the cookie.

value.span: 如果應用程式將目標設為 .NET Framework 4.7.2 或更新的版本，預設值為 ；否則預設值為 。

span.span: If the application targets the .NET Framework 4.7.2 or later versions, the default value is ; otherwise, the default value is .
